content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]The purpose of RoG Men’s Ministry is to be used by God to bring men to Christ and to help them become more like Christ.

We believe every man should strive to:

  1. Know God Personally
  2. Communicate With God Regularly
  3. Absorb God’s Word Daily
  4. Relate To Others Openly
  5. Follow God’s Call Passionately

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”11386″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”none”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”11383″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”none”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”11385″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”none”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
